RecommendedBlending.title: Recommended Blending
RecommendedBlending.popup:
• This is a recommended recipe for those who have difficulty choosing raw materials.
  • Recommended blending is a semi-finished product that has already been formulated with effective ingredients and formulations.
  • Choose the recommended recipe you want.

RawMaterial.title: Raw Material
RawMaterial.popup:
• This is a menu where I make my own health functional food recipes.

package.title: Package selection
package.popup:
• Please select the desired package.
  • When requesting a sample, please check 'Not Selected' for package selection.
  • Subpackages are the most used packages. If there is a separate package you want, please indicate it on the next page.

final.note:
